newsitem.title: USA: Susa Partnership sets $100 mln in notes.
newsitem.headline: Susa Partnership sets $100 mln in notes.

text.p: The following debt issue from Susa Partnership was priced on Monday, according to lead manager Goldman Sachs & Co Inc.
TYPE NOTES ISS PRICE 99.721 FIRST PAY DATE
LAST MOODY'S BAA3 YIELD 7.176 PCT MAKE-WHOLE-CALL AT 20
LAST S&P BBB-MINUS SPREAD +95 BP BASIS POINTS
